replies.msg:
Fiji earthquake: Pacific islands ROCKED by HUGE 8.1 magnitude earthquake

A HUGE earthquake has struck off the coast of Fiji with authorities in New Zealand working to establish whether the massive tremor could trigger a tsunami.

The powerful 8.1 magnitude tremor struck 107km east of Suva at 4.39pm BST (3.49am Friday local time).

The quake had a depth of 652km, according to data from earthquake monitoring service CSEM.

The Civil Defence and Emergency Management service in New Zealand tweeted: “We are assessing whether the 8.1M FIJI earthquake poses any tsunami threat to NZ. More info to follow”

https://www.express.co.uk/news/world/1014031/fiji-earthquake-pacific-ring-of-fire-suva-tsunami-warning


南太平洋上個月先好似震完一次8.2一次7.1
震源深度6百幾公里........應該無咁大鑊？
